task_1.additional_fees: 3% processing fee for international payments, $250 annual contract maintenance fee

task_2.payment_request_email:
Subject: Payment Request - April 2023 Commission

Dear Mr. Johnson,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to request payment for the commission due as per our representation agreement dated January 15, 2023.

Based on your total earnings of $50,000 for the month of April 2023, the following payment is now due:

Gross Earnings: $50,000.00
Commission (15%): $7,500.00
Processing Fee (3% - international payment): $250.00
Total Amount Due: $7,750.00

As outlined in our agreement, payment is due within 15 days of receipt of this notice. Please remit payment via wire transfer to our account using the details provided below:

Bank Name: First National Bank
Account Name: Elite Talent Management LLC
Account Number: 12345678
Routing Number: 987654321
Reference: Johnson-April2023

Please confirm once the payment has been processed. If you have any questions or concerns regarding this invoice, please don't hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,

Sarah Williams
Talent Agent
Elite Talent Management
Phone: (555) 123-4567
Email: sarah.williams@elitetalent.com
